name: Echo Sabre
description: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

abilities.name: Echo Strike
abilities.description: The next attack grants the wielder a buff that greatly increases attack speed for one attack.
notes: The triggering attack also briefly slows the enemy's movement speed. The second attack does not slow.
Ranged heroes cannot use Echo Strike.
The effect triggers upon reaching the attack point of an attack, regardless of whether the attack lands or not.
Triggers against and fully affects any target the wielder attacks.
Grants the wielder an attack speed bonus upon triggering, the second attack is not an Instant Attack.
The attack speed buff has no set duration. It lasts until the user makes a second attack.
The buff is removed upon reaching the attack point of the next attack, regardless of whether it lands or not.
Echo Strike triggers on Instant Attacks as well, except certain specific abilities.
Does not stack with Falcon Rush - when Echo Strike is off cooldown, Falcon Rush does not trigger.
The slow debuff cannot be applied by Clones.
The attacks first apply the slow debuff, then their own attack damage.
Multiple instances of the slow debuff do not stack.

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
15 main attack damage to Strength heroes.
6.75 main attack damage to universal heroes.
